contents.name: Brother's Burrito
contents.description: Flour tortilla filled with rice, choice of beans & meat, cheese & lettuce, choice of salsa, guacamole & sour cream.

contents.name: Veggie Burrito
contents.description: Just the same as Brother's, no meat

contents.name: Talia's Taco
contents.description: Choice of soft flour, soft corn, or crispy corn shell, filled with meat, cheese, lettuce & choice of salsa

contents.name: 25th Street Taco
contents.description: Double layer taco with refried beans, soft & crispy shell and your choice of chicken, beef or pork

contents.name: Taco Salad
contents.description: Bed of tri-color corn chips & lettuce topped with choice of beans & meat, cheese, salsa, guacamole & sour cream

contents.name: Nachos
contents.description: Tri-color corn chips topped with melted cheese, choice of beans, salsa, guacamole & sour cream

contents.name: Baby Burrito
contents.description: Soft taco shell rolled up with beans, cheese & salsa

contents.name: Meat
contents.description:
*Shredded chicken in a tomato-chipotle sauce
*Spicy shredded beef barbacoa
*Savory pulled pork carnitas

contents.name: Salsa
contents.description:
*Pico de Gallo (chunky & mild)
*Grandma's (mild,but sweetâ€¦ yum!)
*Red (medium-hot)
*Fiery Hot Habanero

contents.name: Fajita Veggies
contents.description: Sweet yellow onions & green bell peppers
